ing: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans Italian-style diced tomatoes, undrained
des: "Make a simple soup into something wonderful! Serve alone or as a side. Great with Italian baked chicken and salad, or with a grilled cheese sandwich."
ins: Combine the tomato soup, diced tomatoes, water, and milk in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir in Gorgonzola cheese, garlic, basil, and onion powder. Reduce heat to low; simmer 15 to 20 minutes, stirring often.
